mapper.sql: id, age, result_id, screening_org_id, screening_plan_school_student_id,src_screening_notice_id,task_id, plan_id, district_id, school_age, gender, warning_level, vision_l, vision_r, is_low_vision, is_refractive_error, is_myopia, is_hyperopia, is_astigmatism, is_recommend_visit, is_rescreen, rescreen_error_num, is_valid, create_time, school_id, school_grade_code, school_class_name, myopia_warning_level, naked_vision_warning_level, glasses_type, vision_correction

mspss.student_name, mspss.gender, mspss.birthday, mspss.nation, mspss.school_id, mspss.school_no, mspss.school_name, mspss.grade_name, mspss.class_name, mspss.student_no, mspss.id_card, mspss.parent_phone, mspss.province_code, mspss.city_code, mspss.town_code, mspss.area_code, mspss.address, mvsr.vision_data, mvsr.computer_optometry, msc.glasses_type, msc.warning_level, msc.is_rescreen, msc.screening_plan_school_student_id
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM m_stat_conclusion
ORDER by id desc LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT msc.*, mvsr.school_id FROM m_stat_conclusion msc LEFT JOIN m_vision_screening_result mvsr ON msc.result_id = mvsr.id WHERE msc.plan_id = #{screeningPlanId}

SELECT
FROM m_stat_conclusion msc LEFT JOIN m_vision_screening_result mvsr ON msc.result_id = mvsr.id LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON msc.screening_plan_school_student_id = mspss.id WHERE msc.src_screening_notice_id = #{screeningNoticeId} AND msc.district_id IN #{id} ORDER BY mspss.school_name, mspss.grade_name, mspss.class_name, mspss.student_no

SELECT
FROM m_stat_conclusion msc LEFT JOIN m_vision_screening_result mvsr ON msc.result_id = mvsr.id LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON msc.screening_plan_school_student_id = mspss.id WHERE msc.src_screening_notice_id = #{screeningNoticeId} AND msc.school_id = #{schoolId} ORDER BY mspss.school_name, mspss.grade_name, mspss.class_name, mspss.student_no

SELECT
FROM m_stat_conclusion msc LEFT JOIN m_vision_screening_result mvsr ON msc.result_id = mvsr.id LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON msc.screening_plan_school_student_id = mspss.id WHERE msc.plan_id = #{screeningPlanId} AND msc.school_id = #{schoolId} ORDER BY mspss.school_name, mspss.grade_name, mspss.class_name, mspss.student_no

SELECT
FROM m_stat_conclusion msc LEFT JOIN m_vision_screening_result mvsr ON msc.result_id = mvsr.id LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON msc.screening_plan_school_student_id = mspss.id WHERE msc.src_screening_notice_id = #{screeningNoticeId} AND mvsr.screening_org_id = #{screeningOrgId} ORDER BY mspss.school_name, mspss.grade_name, mspss.class_name, mspss.student_no

SELECT
FROM m_stat_conclusion msc LEFT JOIN m_vision_screening_result mvsr ON msc.result_id = mvsr.id LEFT JOIN m_screening_plan_school_student mspss ON msc.screening_plan_school_student_id = mspss.id WHERE msc.plan_id = #{screeningPlanId} AND mvsr.screening_org_id = #{screeningOrgId} ORDER BY mspss.school_name, mspss.grade_name, mspss.class_name, mspss.student_no
select distinct school_id from m_stat_conclusion where plan_id = #{planId}
